original_text: So we should come near to God and we should not be afraid. God is our King. We can ask him to help us when we need help. We know that he will forgive us and he will be kind to us in whatever way we need.
korean_text: 그러므로 우리는 긍휼하심을 받고 때를 따라 돕는 은혜를 얻기 위하여 은혜의 보좌 앞에 담대히 나아갈 것이니라

sentences.original_text: So we should come near to God
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 우리는 하나님께 가까이 나아가야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and we should not be afraid
We can ask him to help us
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그에게 도움을 청할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: We know that he will forgive us
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그가 우리를 용서하실 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: and he will be kind to us
